desc: EcoPlanet Environmental LLC was formed to solve many of the environmental issues facing the world. Our innovative technology is the result of the work of Dr. Gary Strobel. Dr Strobel is recognized as the world’s expert in the study of endophytes.

layout.text: EcoPlanet One Health recognizes that the health of animals, people and the environment are globally linked. We live in a world of One Health. Our mission is to develop innovative products that enhance the well-being of our interconnected world.
